CustomField.formula: ((5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( Ready_End_Date__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(Ready_End_Date__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( Ready_Start_Date__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(Ready_Start_Date__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ))*24
CustomField.label: Ready Time
